summary: Makes vampire eyes available for selection without being a vampire. *does not apply to khajiit or argonian*
descriptionHtml:
Makes vampire eyes available on character creation for non-vampire characters, for both male and female.

So i was searching the nexus for this kind of mod just to find out that they either didn\'t work or they simply worked for one specific sex. But worry no more cuz\' this works on all races and sex. (except khajiit and argonian of course). I also included the 2 variants.

Instructions:
As usual place the .esp file inside your data folder, which is by default at:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
or
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: dark1402
